text: Andrew John Ridgeley (born 26 January 1963) is an English singer-songwriter and record producer. He was half of the musical duo Wham! in the 1980s. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:English rock singers Category:English rock guitarists Category:English singer- songwriters Category:English pop singers Category:English pop musicians Category:Musicians from Surrey Category:Singers from Surrey Category:Writers from Surrey
title: Andrew Ridgeley
